SELECT ID, PWD, NAME FROM FOOD_ADMIN WHERE 1=1
AND ID = #{adminId}

SELECT A.PRD_NM AS FUD_NM, CNT FROM ( SELECT PRD_NM, 90000000 + COUNT(*) CNT FROM FOOD_PROD_HIS WHERE MOD_DT >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) /* 현재 날짜 하루 이전 */ GROUP BY PRD_NM UNION ALL SELECT A.FUD_NM,A.CNT FROM ( SELECT FUD_NM, 1 AAA, DATE_FORMAT(CRT_DT,'%Y%m%d') CNT FROM FUD ORDER BY CRT_DT DESC LIMIT 10 ) A ) A ORDER BY CNT DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT A.PRD_NM AS FUD_NM, CASE WHEN A.CNT >= 90000000 THEN A.CNT - 90000000 ELSE 0 END CNT FROM ( SELECT A.PRD_NM, CNT FROM ( SELECT PRD_NM, 90000000 + COUNT(*) CNT FROM FOOD_PROD_HIS WHERE MOD_DT >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{searchTime} day_hour) /* 시간 입력 */ GROUP BY PRD_NM UNION ALL SELECT A.FUD_NM,A.CNT FROM ( SELECT FUD_NM, 1 AAA, DATE_FORMAT(CRT_DT,'%Y%m%d') CNT FROM FUD ORDER BY CRT_DT DESC LIMIT 10 ) A ) A ORDER BY CNT DESC LIMIT 10 ) A

SELECT REQ_SEQ, IMG_ID, IMG_PTH, IMG_NM, DATE_FORMAT(MOD_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS MOD_DT FROM FOOD_PROD_IMG WHERE 1=1
AND REQ_SEQ = #{query.reqSeq}
